# kCFUserNotificationOtherResponse

**Global Variable**

The third button was pressed.

## Declaration

```swift
var kCFUserNotificationOtherResponse: CFOptionFlags { get }
```

## Constants

- **kCFUserNotificationDefaultResponse**: The default button was pressed.
- **kCFUserNotificationAlternateResponse**: The alternate button was pressed.
- **kCFUserNotificationCancelResponse**: No button was pressed and the notification timed out.

items.description: No button was pressed and the notification timed out.
